    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uklonska mrežica</string>
            <string language="en">Diffraction Grating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optisches Raster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réseau de Diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grating De Diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reticolo di diffrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κιγκλίδωμα διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rejilla De Difracción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv valovovne dolžine svetlobe in gostote uklonske mrežice na uklon.</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of light's wavelength and density of diffraction grating on the angle of diffraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uklonska mrežica</string>
            <string language="en">diffraction grating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uklon</string>
            <string language="en">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt der Wellenlänge des Lichtes und Dichte
des optischen Rasters auf dem Winkel der Beugung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la longueur d'onde de la lumière et 
densité du réseau de diffraction sur l'angle de la diffraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito do wavelength da luz e densidade do 
grating de diffraction no ângulo do diffraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della lunghezza d'onda della luce e 
densità del reticolo di diffrazione sull'angolo di diffrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση του μήκους κύματος του φωτός και πυκνότητα
του κιγκλιδώματος διάθλασης στη γωνία της διάθλασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la longitud de onda de la luz y 
densidad de la rejilla de difracción en el ángulo de la difracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optisches Raster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
